info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The flat and host both were outstanding. flat situated in a residential area,within walking distance from the main road.lots of restaurants and supershops within a minutes walk.the place was spotless when we checked in,exactly the same as pictures.Host was very helpful and friendly.He was regularly taking updates about our experience and if there is anything they can do.cleaning was done in every other day. There was supply for pure drinking water which i never expected in Dhaka. quiet neighbourhood so you won't feel that you are in Dhaka.super secured place and strongly recommended.I will definitely book this place for my future trips.
We felt like we were in our own Home. This is a 3bhk apartment with ample space. kitchen is also available. Wonderful experience. Highly recommended.
